text:
Adverse haemodynamic effects of high-dose aprotinin in a paediatric cardiac surgical patient.
 High-dose aprotinin for reduction of intra- and postoperative blood loss was associated with profound hypotension and flushing in a 3.5-year-old child who underwent cardiac surgery.
 Treatment with noradrenaline and intravenous fluid was required.
 Cardiovascular stability was restored after 10 minutes.
